entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
